sql: select * from T02 where MODE = '[url:statementmode]' and STATEMENT_ID = '[url:statement]' and SUBSTATEMENT_ID = '[url:substatement]'

select * from T03 where MODE = '[url:statementmode]' and STATEMENT_ID = '[url:statement]' and SUBSTATEMENT_ID = '[url:substatement]'

insert into T03(ID, MODE, STATEMENT_ID, SUBSTATEMENT_ID, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_DATE) values('[sys:uuid]', '[url:statementmode]', '[url:statement]', '[url:substatement]', '[sys:user-id]', datetime(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'localtime'))

select a.A as 'key', (a.s1 / b.s2) as 'value' from (select A, CAST(sum(B) as double) as s1 from C where SUBSTATEMENT_ID in ([json:children]) and (MODE = 0 or MODE = 1) group by A) a left join (select CAST(sum(B) as double) as s2 from D where SUBSTATEMENT_ID in ([json:children]) and (MODE = 0 or MODE = 1)) b
